title: Miles Teller Gives Wife Remade Wedding Dress for Christmas After Original Burned in January Wildfires
summary: The actor, who lived in the Pacific Palisades, lost his home to the blazes that tore across Los Angeles.

title: Nine Years After Carrie Fisher Died, Billie Lourd Says Mom “Lives on Through Joy” With Kids, Dad Bryan Lourd
summary: The 'American Horror Story' actress shared a sweet morning ritual with her children and their grandfather and connected it to her grief on the anniversary of her mother's death.
